kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_1:
§bThe bottom consists of a maximum of 16x16
§bRectangular Scorched Bricks composition
kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
§bFoundry Controller
§bFuel Tank
§bScorched Drain
kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_6:
§bThe rest of the surface we fill with bricks
§bAt the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_7: §bIn addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
kubejs.ponder.scorched.text_8: §cFinally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_1:
§bThe bottom consists of a maximum of 11x11
§bRectangular Seared Bricks composition
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
§bFuel Tank
§bSmeltery Controller
§bSeared Drain
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_6:
§bThe rest of the surface we fill with bricks
§bAt the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_7: §bIn addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
kubejs.ponder.smeltery.text_8: §cFinally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
